prompt: Your task is to create a mind map for drawing a poster according to my requirements. You need to create a mind map for painting, which I will use to draw a poster. Please include all the basic elements of the poster in the mind map and fill in the content as required, so that the mind map can clearly express the requirements for drawing the poster. The mind map should organize these elements through four branches: main visual, secondary visual, text information, and size/format.
